list-item.p: Sexual abuse during adulthood was defined as pressured or forced vaginal or anal sex using violence or being threatened or hurt with a weapon produced by any perpetrator.
Emotional or psychological damage was defined by traumas or extraordinarily stressful events that occur repeatedly and shatter her sense of security produced by any perpetrator.

Serious physical injury meant an injury that caused a reasonable risk of death or caused serious or permanent disfigurement or caused significant physical pain or caused serious impairment of health produced by any perpetrator.
